Help with this page

If you'd like to find an eBook or eJournal with us, please use the search box above and enter key words about the item you'd like to search for. For example, if you would like an eBook on Queen Mary's Scotland, try entering 'scotland queen mary'.

If you're looking to refine your search further, you can either use the refinement tools per-search, click 'Advanced search' and limit your searches that way, or, try searching specifically for books, equipment, or, anything on our catalogue.
